ISSUE.TITLE: Add inventory as part of dynamic host filter
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Add inventory as part of dynamic host filter. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9053044/98982779-e30c1100-24ed-11eb-826b-db5327144719.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9053044/98982949-1cdd1780-24ee-11eb-84cf-30e2bf8f7f8e.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #8463 from nixocio/ui_issue_7130 Add feature to associate teams to users Reviewed-by: https://github.com/apps/softwarefactory-project-zuul

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add updates related to smart inventories Add updates related to smart inventories. * Add popover for `Smart host filter`. * Rename `Host filter` to `Smart host filter` per mockup. * Add inventory as part of dynamic host filter. See: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/8581 Also: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/8548
